channel.title: Thrashie - Street
channel.description:
So I went ahead and made a song using a lot of the new orchestral leads, also something to listen to while the album is being worked on. Hope you guys enjoy
![image|500x500](upload://rqMcYUWvrB4hi8Ep6PJXoZMPoUg.jpeg)
https://soundcloud.com/rainbrothrash/street

item.title: Thrashie - Street
item.dc:creator: TiDe
item.description:
Love the track.

Maybe a small amount more bass? Might detract from the project as a whole, however.

Will be paying more attention to you in the future.

Read full topic

item.title: Thrashie - Street

item.description:
Yeah that’s what I’m probably gonna do. ^-^

Read full topic

item.title: Thrashie - Street
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Maybe consider putting up a single or two first, with space between their release dates, then dropping the album after another gap.

Just a thought.

A lot of people instinctively assume that dropping an album as the first release is what they want to do. But, it’s worth checking out some discussion about ‘release schedules’ on t’webs.

Dropping an album first might not be the best approach.

Read full topic

item.title: Thrashie - Street
item.dc:creator: Thrashie
item.description:
Tru I’ll be sure to put some stuff on there when the album is finished.

Read full topic

item.title: Thrashie - Street

item.description:
I like the song a lot. Good job. PS: Maybe a Little bit more Bass would give it a better jive. Go get it.

item.title: Thrashie - Street
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Great stuff.
Pushing the boundaries, and leading the way on what can be achieved in Auxy - as always.

Liked and Reposted, natch.

 
Now… isn’t it about time you got some stuff up on Spotify, etc…?
